description:
Maya has given up on Bunmei. She decides to stop the prophesy herself and Bunmei is confused about the sudden change in attitude. Meanwhile, Kozue heads down the path towards the occult... Non-rusting spoons, ghost summoning, tsuchinoko, aliens, poltergeists?! Kozue swears to herself she will see these phenomena firsthand someday! Then the near-death monitor shows a candidate...
Source: crunchyroll
